metadata.Title: CVE-2021-41816 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
CGI.escape_html in Ruby before 2.7.5 and 3.x before 3.0.3 has an integer overflow and resultant buffer overflow via a long string on platforms (such as Windows) where size_t and long have different numbers of bytes. This also affects the CGI gem before 0.3.1 for Ruby.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-41816` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libruby2.7 - 2.7.4-1ubuntu3.1
ruby2.7 - 2.7.4-1ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby2.7 package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7.4-1ubuntu3.1').
